data.title: 10 Questions For The Dalai Lama
data.meta_description: A lone filmmaker is granted one hour to ask 10 questions of the 14th Dalai Lama of Tibet. The story is woven between a journeyman's personal observations, a government in exile, and the life and wisdom of one of the premier spiritual leaders of our time.
